alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 3:43PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Lander and northwestern Eureka Counties through 415 PM PDT... At 342 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles west of Crescent Valley, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crescent Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County
